#civicmedia Takeaway- Twitter doesn't replace old media, it just seems to compliment it. We need to find the balance
#civicmedia Nextdrop has SO much to learn from Al Jazeera.  They are the mainstream media we want to learn from.
#civicmedia Al Jazeera focuses on building networks, and building them fast/creatively. LOVE how entrepreneurial and flexible it is.
#civicmedia New respect for Al Jazeera. WOW. Love the way you understand the culture and context before going in to better vet news.
#civicmedia social media NOT  "cheap" news option. Agencies should have respect for this news source- otherwise bad news is produced
#civicmedia is Al Jazeerea suggesting everyone in a news room have basic knowledge on how to obtain info via social media? Interesting
#civicmedia so true- need to bring people into the narrative in a way that drives the story forward. Ad hoc audience involvement is the past
#civicmedia global citizen media is associated with Arab Spring- but can we use it to work WITH certain gvt entities? is that selling out?
RT @rainworksomni: MuseumPublicity features TrendHunter article on Rainworks disrupting museum space with  social enterprise http://bit. ...
#civicmedia Al Jazeera echoed voices on the ground and because of that, offered them protection. Interesting concept- publicity is "cover"
#civicmedia seems like tension between grassroots civic media and people producing the actual platform to host the movements?
@simransethi met one of your fantastic colleagues in Boston today #civicmedia Knight News conference- hope you are well!
#civicmedia @ethanz maps are the future- question: is Google taking over Civic media? are there lots of new mapping tools?Is this a problem?
@ethanz #civicmedia  fantastic point about how  stories people "like" (Saudi women not driving) are amplified but not others (Dream Act)
#civicmedia love the focus on how to design for community the first but doesn't answer the question of how to scale responsibly after that
